data.eml:eml: Iberorhyzobius Raimundo & Canepari gen. nov., for Coccidula rondensis Eizaguirre (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Raimundo, Armando, Canepari, Claudio, Mendel, Zvi, Branco, Manuela, Franco, José Carlos (2006): Iberorhyzobius Raimundo & Canepari gen. nov., for Coccidula rondensis Eizaguirre (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae). Zootaxa 1312: 49-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173892
